title: COURT HIRE – BRISBANE BADMINTON CENTRE
description: Play on Brisbane’s highest-ceiling indoor badminton courts in a clean, fully lit and professionally managed environment. Ideal for casual play, training, social groups and competition.
facilityHighlights: 9 premium indoor courts with professional flooring & lighting
Badminton shoes only for player safety and court protection
Free parking & easy access from major roads

courtHireMembership.title: Court Hire Membership – $69 per year
benefits: Save $5 per hour, per court during peak times

bulkAndGroupDiscounts.title: Bulk & Group Discounts (No Membership Required)
benefits: Suitable for social groups, clubs, schools & corporate bookings

customerFocusedService: Flexible booking support at the front desk
